mapper.update: update ss_menu set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relative = #{relative,jdbcType=BIT}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t3.* from ss_role_res t1,ss_role_staff t2,ss_menu t3 where 1=1 and t1.res_type=1 and t1.role_id=t2.role_id and t2.staff_id=#{staffId} and t1.res_id=t3.id group by id order by seq asc
